TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CachedAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指示 Visual Studio Tools for Office 运行时将指定的数据对象添加到文档中的数据缓存。

span.span: Instructs the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime to add the specified data object to the data cache in the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅可在文档级自定义 Word 或 Excel 使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的。This attribute can only be used in a document-level customization for Word or Excel created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio. 若要添加到文档中的数据缓存的对象，该对象必须满足的要求的公共类型。To add an object to the data cache in a document, the object must have a public type that meets the requirements of . 有关将对象添加到数据缓存的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。For more information about adding objects to the data cache, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md). 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87). 如果你想要更好地控制数据对象的缓存行为，你可以实施中的对象类型的接口。If you want to have greater control over the caching behavior of the data object, you can implement the interface in the type of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
